sentences.en: According to research, only one smoker in a hundred is able to kick the habit without some kind of help.
sentences.cn: 研究表明, 一百名吸烟者中只有一名能够不借助任何帮助成功戒烟.
艾德是个烟瘾很大的人.

sentences.en: After twenty years as a chain smoker Mr Nathe has given up the habit.
sentences.cn: 当了20年的烟鬼后，纳特先生戒了烟。

sentences.en: Anyone who does not believe that smoking is an addiction has never been a chronic smoker.
sentences.cn: 不相信抽烟能上瘾的人肯定不是老烟民。

sentences.en: He had a smoker’s cough (= a cough caused by smoking cigarettes regularly ) .
sentences.cn: 他因为经常吸烟而得了咳嗽病。

sentences.en: He was not a heavy smoker.
He's a habitual smoker -- he always has a cigarette while having dinner.
sentences.cn: 他是个吸烟成瘾者 ─ ─吃饭时总要吸一支烟.

sentences.en: Henry is a chain smoker, smoking at least five packs a day.
sentences.cn: 亨利烟瘾很大, 每天最少吸五包.

sentences.en: How long have you been a smoker?
I don't like going a long journey in a smoker.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢坐在一节可以吸烟的车厢里长途旅行.

sentences.en: It is hard for an inveterate smoker to give up tobacco.
sentences.cn: 要一位有多年烟瘾的烟民戒烟是困难的。

sentences.en: It transpired that the fire was caused by a careless smoker.
sentences.cn: 据传这场大火是由一位粗心的吸烟者造成的.

sentences.en: My grandad was a heavy smoker (= someone who smokes a lot ) .
Nicotine produces a feeling of well-being in the smoker.
sentences.cn: 尼古丁给吸烟者带来一种愉悦的感觉。

sentences.en: The smoker tossed away the lighted match and so caused a fire.
sentences.cn: 那个抽烟的人随手扔掉火柴棒,引起了一场火灾.

sentences.en: Total dispensation of cigarettes can be difficult for a habitual smoker.
sentences.cn: 吸惯烟的人要做到完全不吸烟不是一件容易的事.

sentences.en: You don't need to be a smoker or a drinker to risk heart disease.
sentences.cn: 并不是只有抽烟喝酒的人才会犯心脏病。
